title: Light weight
description: This is a lightweight and interactive in-browser GraphQL IDE that offers a clean and intuitive interface, making it easy to explore and experiment with GraphQL APIs

title: Interactive Documentation
description: Discover the schema documentation, including types, fields, and arguments providing helpful information as you compose your queries

title: Request Variables and Headers
description: You can parameterize your queries, making them more dynamic and reusable. Instead of hardcoding values directly into the query, you can define variables and pass their values at runtime
